name: Floppy and the Sleepy Planet
description:
Broad-Strokes LLC formed in 2017 with the idea to focus on family friendly stylized video game development that can be enjoyed by any age and demographic. While creating supplementary materials that focus on trans-media products to support the individual video game Ip’s. The studio is composed of passionate individuals who both work still in and out of the game industry while growing the company's first flagship Ip, Floppy and The Sleepy Planet.
